error: `field_presence` is not supported in Edition 2023
  --> testdata/editions/inheritance.proto:23:8
   |
17 | edition = "2023";
   |           ------ edition specified here
...
23 | option features.field_presence = IMPLICIT;
   |        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   = help: `field_presence` requires at least Edition 2023

warning: `legacy_closed_enum` is deprecated in Edition 2023
  --> testdata/editions/inheritance.proto:24:8
   |
17 | edition = "2023";
   |           ------ edition specified here
...
23 | option features.field_presence = IMPLICIT;
24 | option features.(pb.cpp).legacy_closed_enum = false;
   |        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   = help: deprecated since Edition 2023
   = help: deprecated: The legacy closed enum behavior in C++ is deprecated and
           is scheduled to be removed in edition 2025. See
           http://protobuf.dev/programming-guides/enum/#cpp for more information

error: `repeated_field_encoding` is not supported in Edition 2023
  --> testdata/editions/inheritance.proto:27:27
   |
17 | edition = "2023";
   |           ------ edition specified here
...
27 |     repeated int32 x = 1 [features.repeated_field_encoding = PACKED];
   |                           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   = help: `repeated_field_encoding` requires at least Edition 2023

error: `field_presence` is not supported in Edition 2023
  --> testdata/editions/inheritance.proto:28:18
   |
17 | edition = "2023";
   |           ------ edition specified here
...
27 |     repeated int32 x = 1 [features.repeated_field_encoding = PACKED];
28 |     int32 y = 2 [features.field_presence = LEGACY_REQUIRED];
   |                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   = help: `field_presence` requires at least Edition 2023

encountered 3 errors and 1 warning
